channel.title: Help Me (Pi)
channel.description: So my question is how can i customize the yell tag names on my server. For example giving a mod a high right than a reg mod. as in [HeadMod] And Just [Mod]?

item.title: Help Me (Pi)
item.dc:creator: @LolPvps LolPvps
item.description:
@LolPvps wrote:

Oh I see Now. I’ll Try to figure it out. I think i know what to do now

Read full topic

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

LolPvps:

So by all means you can’t have a custom made rank with a Crown or whatsoever?

Sure you can, it just requires changes to the client

item.title: Help Me (Pi)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

LolPvps:

Thanks It Worked!. But How Come When i Type to public it doesnt show crown, but when i type in ::yell it does :o.

By default the client only renders crowns for rights 1 and 2. We’ve started to expand on it for all these other things, so make sure its drawing the crown for whatever rank you chose.

The reason it works in yell is because you force it to render by sending ‘<img=1>’

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me (Pi)
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

Just add this after your simple mod yell string.

else if (c.playerRights == X){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=123456>[Super-Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }

Change the X here “c.playerRights == X” to you Super mod #…

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me (Pi)
item.dc:creator: @LolPvps LolPvps
item.description:
@LolPvps wrote:

[code=actionscript]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.getItems().deleteItem(4045, 9999);
if (Connection.isMuted©)
return;
if (c.Jail == true){
c.sendMessage(“You can’t yell whilst in jail!”);
return;
}
if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=123456>[Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535>[Administrator]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dom”)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[Co-Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 5){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Super Donator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0) {
c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use ::Yell! Type ::Donate for more information.<img=0>");

						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

Read full topic
